description:
Minashiro Soushi is Kazuki`s close friend who is easily identifiable by the large scar from his left eyelid down to his cheek, which was given to him accidentally by Kazuki when they were very young.
Soushi`s father is the headmaster of the school on Tatsumiya Island, as well as the commander of Alvis. His mother died while he was still young. He is capable of linking with Fafner robots as well as very skilled at using the Siegfried System.
name: Minashiro Soushi
